section.title: Enabling the Storage Inventory Server Roles
section.para: The procedure describes the steps to enable storage inventory server roles.

procedure.title: To Enable the Storage Inventory Server Roles

step.para: Click on the Settings accordion, then click Zones.
Click the zone where the CloudForms Management Engine server is located.
From the Server page, go to Server Control.

From the list of Server Roles, select Storage Inventory. To collect Capacity and Utilization data, select the appropriate Storage Capacity and Utilization Roles as well. See Settings and Operations Guide for more information.
